sentences: In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBI/2009/L.28 ), the SBI: takes note of documents issued to date on Convention Article 4.8 (adverse effects) and decisions 5/CP.7 (implementation of Article 4.8 and 4.9, of the Convention) and 1/CP.10 (Buenos Aires programme of work); recalls that parties were invited to submit views on further action on this matter by 22 March 2010; requests the Chair to continue developing draft decision text; and agrees to continue work on the matter at SBI 32.
